div.p: A unique code for a gene, including protein coding genes, ncRNA genes and pseudogenes, to allow unambiguous communication, drawn from HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: A unique code for a gene, including protein coding genes, ncRNA genes and pseudogenes, to allow unambiguous communication, drawn from HUGO Gene Nomenclature Committee.
